definitions.definition: a person whose profession is acting on the stage, in movies, or on television.
examples: performer, player, thespian, trouper; Morefilm star, star, starlet, matinee idol; informalham; lead, leading man, leading lady, stand-in "daily bus tours take you past the homes of your favorite Hollywood actors and actresses"Morefilm star, star, starlet, matinee idol; ham; lead, leading man, leading lady, stand-in daily bus tours take you past the homes of your favorite Hollywood actors and actresses

definitions.definition: a person who behaves in a way that is not genuine.
examples: in war one must be a good actor

definitions.definition: a participant in an action or process.
examples: employers are key actors within industrial relations
